info.description: A collection of magical weapons, armors, and items found by the PCs of the Almir campaign.
info.author: Salty Coffee

element.name: Almir Magical Armors, Weapons, and Items

description.p: This is a collection of magical armors, weapons, and items found within the Almir DnD 5e Campaign.

A simple silver chain adorned with a diamond-shaped pendant with a small amethyst set in the center. While attuned to the amulet, you can summon a spectral homunculus that will obey your commands and, to the best of its ability, complete simple tasks for 1 hour. Once the homunculus has been summoned, it cannot be summoned again until you finish a long rest.
